comment.author: 22716314@N06
comment._content:
John McGraw 
John Joseph McGraw (Mugsy or Little Napoleon) Bats Left, Throws Right 
Height 5' 7", Weight 155 lb. 
 Debut August 26, 1891 
Final Game September 12, 1906 
Born April 7, 1873 in Truxton, NY 
Died February 25, 1934 in New Rochelle, NY 
Inducted into the Hall of Fame in 1937.
